item.description:
A meeting will be held in Worcester to organize impeachment efforts in the New England states.

Time/Date/Location details are:

Time: 12noon-5pm
Clark University
Jefferson Building - Room 218
Worcester, Massachusetts

Notify Dan DeWalt at patrioticresponse@yahoo.com for signup & agenda.

Proposed agenda by Dan:

Welcome and layout of meeting - Dan

Introduction of moderator - Herb

Each state count their numbers, report on existing state impeachment efforts

Proposed statement of purpose read and goal of day to be specific action plans per state - Dan

States caucus, select spokesperson and secretary, list priorities for state impeachment efforts.

Reconvene as one body, states report to body

Breakout groups, some suggested topics:
1. working on D.C. reps.
2. working on state legislatures
3. working on the governors? conference
4. working on media coverage
5. working on greater public involvement
6. whether to work with the 911 truth movement
7. whether to work with national impeachment groups, if so, to what end and how?
8. whether to organize ourselves, and if so , how?
9. how to best work the NH primary action

Reconvene to hear report from breakout groups

Reach consensus regarding:
statement of purpose,
press release about meeting
name and organizational structure, if any, for today?s group

Adjourn: GO FORTH AND IMPEACH
------------------------------------------------

CARPOOLING: details to follow, but carpooling will be done.
item.name: New England Impeachment meeting
